mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_name, password, status, create_user, create_datetime, update_user, update_datetime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_datetime = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, status, create_user, create_datetime, update_user, update_datetime from user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, user_name, password, status, create_user, create_datetime, update_user, update_datetime from user_info
